title: Is Tour de France momentum swinging toward Tadej Pogačar? ‘The last week should be even better for me’
content:
Hovering at just 17 seconds behind the yellow jersey, a newly confident Pogačar seems poised for more: 'I am feeling day by day better.'

Read the full article at Is Tour de France momentum swinging toward Tadej Pogačar? ‘The last week should be even better for me’ on Velo.
author: ahood
